III.ii.3.2.h
.
Requests Rejected by the PMR Contractor
When the PMR contractor is unable to remediate a PMR reject, VBAAP will generate a reject notice and upload it to the eFolder for further action by VA employees.
Upon discovery of a reject notice, claims processors should
attempt to obtain the missing information from the claims folder or VBMS
complete a new
VA Form 21-4142a
, and
upload the new
VA Form 21-4142a
and a corresponding valid
VA Form 21-4142
together as a package via QuickSubmit for processing by the PMR contractor.
Exception
:  If the PMR reject cannot be resolved with information available in the claims folder or VA systems, the RO processing the claim will follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 3.1.d
, to resolve the issue.
Important
:
If the claimant fails to respond to VA’s request
within 30 days
, route the claim to the rating activity when all other development is complete.
VA processes claims in an electronic environment, which requires a
VA Form 21-4142
with an original signature to be scanned into the claims folder through CMP.  A
VA Form 21-4142
with an original signature
will not
be returned to the ROs.
References
:  For more information on
common reasons
Reject Notices
are created by the PMR contractor, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 3.2.c
, and
the requirement to submit both
VA Forms 21-4142
and
21-4142a
together to initiate the automated PMR process, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 3.2.f
.
